title: Resume flow: volume + artifact fallback
description: Implement resume path mounting existing session volume or restoring from session_artifacts backup.
requirements: Check for existing session volume and mount
If missing, pull latest session JSON from artifact store
Reconstruct opencode session and validate state
plan: Detect existing volume path and mount
If missing, fetch session JSON from artifact store
Start sidecar and verify opencode session
expected_outcome: Sessions reliably resume with preserved state.
acceptance_criteria: Resume uses existing volume when present
Fallback restore works when volume missing
Session state matches last persisted snapshot
